original_text:
Therefore I will take back
    my grain in its time,
    and my wine in its season,
and I will take away my wool and my flax,
    which were to cover her nakedness.
korean_text: 그러므로 내가 내 곡식을 그것이 익을 계절에 도로 찾으며 내가 내 새 포도주를 그것이 맛 들 시기에 도로 찾으며 또 그들의 벌거벗은 몸을 가릴 내 양털과 내 삼을 빼앗으리라

sentences.original_text: Therefore I will take back my grain in its time
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 나는 내 곡식을 그 때에 거두어들이겠다

sentences.original_text: and my wine in its season
and I will take away my wool and my flax
which were to cover her nakedness
